title: 144. Adapting in the New Restaurant Era | The Culinary Edge
description: In this episode of The Barron Report, host Paul Barron sits down with Aaron Noveshen, the founder of The Culinary Edge. Barron and Noveshen explore how restaurants are transforming their business models to accommodate coronavirus guidelines and regulations.
itunes:author: Foodable Network
